subject: Tennis
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Marin Cilic of Croatia, a former top 10 tennis player, tested positive  for nikethamide, a stimulant; he can return to competition on Jan. 31.
snippet: Marin Cilic of Croatia, a former top 10 tennis player, tested positive  for nikethamide, a stimulant; he can return to competition on Jan. 31.
